Name: Explore Mobile Phones and Place an Order for Samsung Models
Description: Navigate through mobile categories, select Samsung models, and place an order. Verify the category page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on span phone -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 3: Click on link mobileBrands (samsung)
Step 4: Click on div hot
Step 5: Click on link samsungGalaxyS23UltraHot
Step 6: Click on link samsungGalaxyZfold5
Step 7: Click on link mobileBrands (samsung2)
Step 8: Click on link mobileBrands (googlePixel)
Step 9: Click on link googlePixel7Pro -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 10: Click on button buy
Step 11: Click on link placeAnOrder -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 12: Click on link samsung -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 13: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Browse Apple Accessories and Place an Order
Description: Navigate to accessories, select Apple products on sale, and place an order. Check the home page after completing the process.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on div object
Step 3: Click on link accessories
Step 4: Click on link apple -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 5: Click on link sale -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 6: Click on button buy
Step 7: Click on link placeAnOrder -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 8: Click on button proceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/*'
Step 9: Click on link policyDocuments (refundPolicy)
Step 10: Click on link policyDocuments (privacyPolicy)
Step 11: Click on link policyDocuments (termsOfService) -> Navigate to page ''
Step 12: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Order iPhone 15 Plus and Verify Checkout Process
Description: Select iPhone 15 Plus, place an order, return to the cart, explore more products, and verify the checkout process.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Select iPhone 15 Plus and place an order
	- Step 1: Click on link iphone15PlusNew -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
	- Step 2: Click on label storageColor (128Gb)
	- Step 3: Click on label storageColor (blue)
	- Step 4: Click on button buy3
	- Step 5: Click on link placeAnOrder
Step 3: Click on button proceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/*'
Step 4: Click on link backToTheCart -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 5: Click on link about -> Navigate to page '/about'
Step 6: Click on link apple -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 7: Click on link sale -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 8: Click on button buy2
Step 9: Click on link placeAnOrder -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 10: Click on button proceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/*'
Step 11: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Complete Order with iPhone 15 Plus and Verify Thank You Page
Description: Select iPhone 15 Plus, proceed to checkout, select cash payment, and complete the order. Verify the thank you page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Select iPhone 15 Plus and place an order
	- Step 1: Click on link iphone15PlusNew -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
	- Step 2: Click on label storageColor (128Gb)
	- Step 3: Click on label storageColor (blue)
	- Step 4: Click on button buy3
	- Step 5: Click on link placeAnOrder
Step 3: Click on button removeItem (remove)
Step 4: Proceed to checkout and enter email for shipping
	- Step 1: Click on button proceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/*'
	- Step 2: Click on input email
	- Step 3: Click on button continueToShipping
	- Step 4: Click on input email
	- Step 5: Click on button continueToShipping
Step 5: Click on div paymentMethodCashOn
Step 6: Click on button completeOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
Step 7: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Add and Remove Items from Cart while Checking Out
Description: Browse Apple products, add to cart, modify selections, and proceed to checkout. Verify the checkout process.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link apple -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 3: Click on button addToCart
Step 4: Click on label productModelColor (iphone15ProMax)
Step 5: Click on label productModelColor (winterBlue)
Step 6: Click on button increased
Step 7: Click on button buy
Step 8: Click on link placeAnOrder
Step 9: Proceed to checkout and enter email for shipping
	- Step 1: Click on button proceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/*'
	- Step 2: Click on input email
	- Step 3: Click on button continueToShipping
	- Step 4: Click on input email
	- Step 5: Click on button continueToShipping
Step 10: Click on link backToTheCart -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 11: Click on button removeItem (remove2)
Step 12: Click on button proceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/*'
Step 13: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
